verses.text: Let \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* requests \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* grace; \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w faith|strong="H0530"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*;

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w judged|strong="H4941"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* eyes.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* evil \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w has|strong="H0776"\w* gone \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w crushed|strong="H1792"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H0776"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dark|strong="H4285"\w*, \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w long|strong="H5769"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w this|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* overcome; \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* full \w of|strong="H7307"\w* fear.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w keep|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w mind|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* early \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* past, giving \w thought|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w acts|strong="H2142"\w*, even \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretched|strong="H6566"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w*: \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w turned|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w*, \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* need \w of|strong="H0776"\w* water. (\w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.)

\w Be|strong="H0408"\w* quick \w in|strong="H3068"\w* answering \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w strength|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3381"\w*: \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* see \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w like|strong="H5973"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* underworld.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* story \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* mercy come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hope \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H2098"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w to|strong="H0413"\w* go; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* hands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* haters; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3068"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w*.

Give \w me|strong="H3925"\w* \w teaching|strong="H3925"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7522"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*: let \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* righteousness.

Give \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* mercy put \w an|strong="H3588"\w* end \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* haters, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* send \w destruction|strong="H0006"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.
